resources.string: * Please enter the phone number for which you want to change the ringing settings. You may be charged for this SMS according to \nyour service provider.
**SMS should only be sent in case of emergency and should not be misused. Images used belong to their respective owners.
Ring them up - Hi, you were not picking up the phone and we were worried sick. So just turned your ringtone volume up a bit.
Hi, you were not picking up the phone and we were worried sick. So just turned your ringtone volume up a bit. To download click- http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=sample.myapplication
Hey, Please download this app. This will help me track you if you forgot to remove your phone from silent mode --
